archimate:Principle.name: Business relevant
archimate:Principle.documentation:
Designs, solutions and services shall align with Tietoevry Tech Services and Tietoevry Group strategy strategic decisions.​
Designs shall consider Tietoevry Tech Services business case and strive for solutions and services that meet or exceed internal business objectives.​
Changes to solutions, services are done only based on valid business need.​
In design of Tietoevry Tech Services standard offerings, “buy and integrate” strategy is favoured over “build and maintain”. ​
